slide_content_0:
This game is a "school simulator game" which is made in Japan. It is made by Garusoft Development Inc.

In this game, you have hundreds of options!

  • You can play with 5 different characters
  • Design your avatar.
  • Make friends and lovers
  • Attend school and gain intelligence
  • Earn money
  • Explore the map
  • And much more!

You can enjoy the game however you like! You can make friends and lovers and enjoy a brilliant life or cause trouble around the map. But before that, borrow weapons from the Yakuza office and get ammunition from the Harbor. You can get them easily if you don’t stop flying.

This game is a "simulator". So, there are many ways to defeat enemies. Of course, if you want to defeat them by yourself, you can do it easily. On the other hand, if you want to defeat them without weapons, of course you can.

There are no descriptions of blood in the game. The concept of death does not exist in this game. So the people in the game world will be only be “stunned” until the next day, when they will wake up and hate you. But some people will not wake up the next day, such as the passers-by and the playable characters, like Cat Butler Robot and the Aida siblings.

You can control and change 5 players in the same stage (the Aida siblings and Cat Butler will be unlocked after watching ADS). Interact with them and the choices for talking will change randomly.

There is no ending in this game. Please make situations as you like!
slide_content_1:
Missions are objectives in the game, although they only seem to be a fun task for the player, because only a few of them actually give you a reward once you complete them. There are 57 missions in total so far, including hidden missions referred to as '???'.

Missions can be found at the top left hand side of the screen, in between the ‘radar’ and ‘help?’ button.

Here are the list of missions, its requirements and its rewards: (Warning: Huge spoilers; Hidden missions are in italics)

Mission Requirements Reward
Japanese: Chinese characters Change the clothes to School uniform, go to the 1st floor or the 2nd floor, find the desk with the sign "My seat". Sit there and wait until the teacher arrives in the classroom. Tap "ACTION" when prompted. Intelligence 1UP!!
Lesson: English Intelligence 1UP!!
Lesson: PC Change the clothes to School uniform, go to the 2nd floor, find the kitchen room or PC room. Sit on any seat and wait until the teacher arrives in the room. Tap "ACTION" when prompted. Intelligence 1UP!!
Home economics: Monkfish Intelligence 1UP!!
Physical education: Marathon Go to School Yard, change the clothes to Gym cloth. Run on the track. Leg strength 5UP!!
Physical education: Ballet Go to Gym, change the clothes to Ballet. Get into the large pink circle inside the gym to start dancing. Leg strength 5UP!!
Defeat the leader of yakuza Go to Yakuza office Himawari, there will be two enemy NPCs named Black clothes man. There will also be weapons and lots of enemy NPCs named Black clothes man inside the building. Find the enemy NPC named Boss, then defeat him. Arm strength 3UP!!
Ride a tea cup Go to Amusement Park. There will be five rides. Tap "ACTION" when prompted to ride them.
Ride a free fall
Ride the Ferris wheel
Ride a roller coaster
Ride a Swan boat
Swim in the school pool(Swimwear) Go to Pool, change the clothes to Swimsuit. Get into the pool to start swimming. Leg strength 5UP!!
Exterminate moths At 15:30-17:00, go to Convenience store. There will be 10 moths inside, shoot them all. ¥2000
+5 Popularity with Mami Fujitsu
Kill 5 skeletons At 19:00-00:00 go to the school building. Go to the 2nd floor, enter the biology lab room. There will be a skeleton that will start attacking if approached. Go to the 3rd floor, enter the break room. There will be 4 skeletons inside. Defeat them all. Arm strength 2UP!!
Order the Chef's choice! At 09:00-21:00, go to Sushi Bar. Sit on any seat, select "Chef's choice : market price".
Defeat 5 Monkfish Go to the 2nd floor, enter the Home Economics room. There will be 5 monkfish inside, shoot them all before they automatically kill themselves.
Drive on the roof of school Get into a car, then drive onto a ramp leading up to the forgery roof, then another ramp the school roof. Make sure you are as precisely at the speed limit on the road as possible as you jump off the ramps to land onto the school roof. A banknote stack worth ¥20000 spawns on the school roof
For repeated clearing, it's worth ¥2000
Wooden horse Go to Yakuza office Himawari, find the room with torture devices. Tap "ACTION" when prompted to use them.
Restraint
Crucifix
Electric chair!
Defeat the bronze statue and the plaster figure At 19:00-00:00, go to the 3rd floor. Enter the locked empty room. There will be an enemy NPC named Bronze Statue inside. Enter the art room. There will be an enemy NPC named Plaster Figure inside. Defeat them both. Arm strength 3UP!!
Shoot down the UFO At 20:00-03:00, there will be a UFO somewhere on the skies of Sakura Town. Find it and destroy it. A banknote stack worth ¥5000 spawns on the spot where the UFO fell down
Popularity degree 100 achieved! Here are the following things you can do to raise your popularity degree:
  • Saying ‘Hello’
  • Hugging
  • Kissing
  • Complimenting (does not work on NPCs with negative mood)
  • Gifting
Popularity degree 200 achieved!
Popularity degree 300 achieved!
Popularity degree 400 achieved!
Popularity degree 500 achieved!
Popularity degree -100 achieved! You are a hated person! Here are the following things you can do to decrease your popularity degree:
  • Insulting
  • Knocking out non-enemy NPCs (does not work on NPCs with ‘Not eligible for data saving’)
Popularity degree -500 achieved! Monstrosity!
Help the lost person At 17:00-21:00, go to Park. There will be three enemy NPCs named Shecker and an NPC named Ranger-yellow on the park stage. Go inside the hedge maze to find an NPC named Ranger-white. Befriend her and ask her to follow. Get Ranger-white out of the maze to complete the mission. Once she is outside, Sheckers will start attacking. ¥3000
Ranger-white and Ranger-yellow will fight the Sheckers
Good night everyone! More than 100 people fainted Knock out 100 NPCs within a day.
Good night Yakuza!! Boss of "Momo-gumi" Go to Yakuza Momo-gumi, attack the NPC named Member of Momo-gumi or destroy one of the buildings nearby. There will be lots of enemy NPCs named Member of Momo-gumi, armed with rocket launchers. Find the enemy NPC named Boss, then defeat him. More enemy NPCs will appear until Boss is defeated. An Armor pickup spawns on the spot where the boss was defeated
The main building on Yakuza Momo-gumi can be entered
(Momo-gumi Inside unlocked)
Popularity degree -1000 achieved! Unbelievable!! Here are the following things you can do to decrease your popularity degree:
  • Insulting
  • Knocking out non-enemy NPCs (does not work on NPCs with ‘Not eligible for data saving’)
Beat the annoying people at the beach! At 17:30-21:00, go to the beach, find umbrellas and grills. There will be 12 NPCs named Party people. Defeat them all.
Defeat the dangers at the wedding ceremony! At 18:00-21:00, go to Wedding Chapel. There will be two NPCs named Groom and Bride. Defeat them both.
Defeat the bears of amusement park show Go to Amusement Park, enter the Bear Cubs Dance Show building. There will be 8 NPCs named TEDDY. They will start attacking after approximately a minute, unless they're attacked first. Defeat them all.
Search for waterways Enter the waterway from either entrance, then exit from the other entrance. You can find a banknote stack worth ¥1000, a Love potion, and a Confusion medicine along the waterway.
Run with a Jet girl Drive a car into a tunnel and find the mysterious girl in kimono sitting on a flying zabuton. Chase her down until she is right beside you.
Find the broccoli-colored hair guy! There is an accessible house against Cafe. Inside the house is an NPC named Bijuu Mike. Talk to him to complete the mission. You found me! I'm Bijuu Mike. You got a trophy! Congratulations!
New mission unlocked
Get all Scrub-chan! Talk to Bijuu Mike. Tap "OK" when the screen says, "I'm missing my scrub-chan, they are playing somewhere in this house. Will you find and collect them for me?" Collect 10 scrub-chans around Bijuu Mike's house. Seven can be found inside the house, while three can be found outside. Once all ten scrub-chans are found, talk to Bijuu Mike to complete the mission. ¥10000
Bijuu Mike can be interacted as a regular NPC
Defeat the skeletons of the waterway Inside the waterway, there will be two enemy NPCs named Skeleton Silver and Skeleton Gold. Defeat them both.
Become smaller with Alice's costume Playing as Girl, change the clothes to Dress of Alice in Wonderland. Tap "Small" and "Large" to complete the mission.
Become larger with Alice's costume
Defeat the members of the kickboxing club Go to the kickboxing club room beside the tea ceremony room, located near Gym. There will be NPCs named Semio and Semika. Defeat them both. It is recommended to change the clothes to Kickboxer before starting this mission. Arm strength 3UP!!
Defeat robber bears LV1 Change the clothes to Police Uniform. Tap the "Mission" button below the "SAVE" and camera buttons, then tap "Level1", "Level2", or "Level3" on the "MISSION SELECT" screen. Defeat all enemy NPCs named Robber bear. (7 on Level1, 9 on Level2, 14 on Level3) ¥20000
Defeat robber bears LV2 ¥30000
Defeat robber bears LV3 ¥40000
Defeat Black sheckers and Red sheckers Go to Quarry, turn right, then turn left. There will be a Black Shecker and four Red Sheckers. Defeat them all, and a second wave of Shecker enemies, consisting of two Black Sheckers and six Red Sheckers, will spawn immediately. Defeat them all. ¥50000
Remove mines Go to Quarry, go straight and follow the path. Destroy all 30 mines scattered along the quarry. ¥10000
Shoot the target in the archery club Go to the archery club room, located near Gym, change the clothes to Archer. Change the weapon to Bow, then shoot any target inside the room from any distance.
UFO Mission 2 Tap "UFO mission2" on the Missions screen, then tap "START" on the "UFO MISSION 2" screen. You will find a bear head UFO. Attack it to start the battle. There will be lots of flying and ground robot enemies. Survive two waves of ground robot enemies, then defeat the UFO.
  • On the first wave, white robot enemies appear.
  • On the second wave, red robot enemies appear, and the UFO starts shooting lasers.
  • On the third wave, the UFO starts shooting homing missiles. The UFO itself becomes vulnerable to attacks from the player character.

It is recommended to disable all non-enemy NPCs and, if necessary, get all playable characters into safe places, such as Shrine, before starting the mission.

¥100000
Octopus Mission Tap "Octopus mission" on the Missions screen, then tap "START" on the "OCTOPUS MISSION" screen. You will find a spherical UFO. Attack it to start the battle. There will be lots of octopus alien and Yellow Shecker enemies. Survive four waves of alien enemies by shooting the UFO.
  • On the first wave, the UFO is white and appears on the residential area.
  • On the second wave, the UFO changes color to red and moves to the school area.
  • On the third wave, the UFO changes color to blue and moves to the empty land beside the Yakuza Momo-gumi building.
  • On the fourth wave, the UFO changes color to gold and moves to the quarry over the area where the Black Shecker and Red Shecker enemies appear.

It is recommended to disable all non-enemy NPCs and, if necessary, get all playable characters into safe places, such as Shrine, before starting the mission.

¥110000
Exploration inside Momo Gumi Go to Yakuza Momo-gumi, find the door with a green circle. Tap "ACTION" when prompted, then tap "Enter the Momo-gumi". There will be traps such as laser, rolling boulders, and flying tops with electricity, and also lots of enemy NPCs named Construction crew and Member of Momo-gumi inside. At the final room, upon crossing a small pond, ten enemies will appear, alongside an enemy NPC named Boss. Defeat him to complete the mission. "TAIGA YUKI, RINA TAMAKI, got a new weapon!"
(Beam Cannon unlocked for Boy and Girl)
Defeat the Corrupt tax office chief! Go to the tax office, find the office room on the topmost floor. There will be an NPC named 'Tax Office Chief', defeat him. A banknote stack worth ¥5000 spawns on the spot where the boss was defeated
The bookshelf in the office room of the tax office can be interacted
Get the gold bar Go to the tax office, find the office room on the topmost floor. There will be a shining spot on the bookshelf, tap "ACTION" when prompted. There will be a safe behind the bookshelf, tap "ACTION" when prompted, then tap "ACTION" again to open the safe door. There will be a stack of gold bars with yen signs beside it. Simply get into the stack to pick it up. ¥500000
slide_content_2:
One of the first steps to start your journey in the PK XD universe is to create your character. Choose the facial expression, skin color, haircut, clothes, and accessories that best match your style. Do not worry! You can then purchase different items from in-game stores, including new hair cuts and colors, and even face paint. Then, choose your name in the game, which will automatically receive a # and numbers to differentiate you from other players, such as Nickname #834.

Then you can enter your home and decorate the rooms as you wish. Click on the house icon and change the wallpaper, floor, and furniture layout. House objects can be placed in any position, including in the air to create mazes and obstacle courses. The garden and exterior of the house can be decorated as well.

New houses and decorations can be purchased in the store.
slide_content_3:
There are many ways to get coins in the PK XD universe! You can:

  • Work at the Pizza Plaza: deliver pizza to our hungry citizens before the time runs out to make some money! You can do this as many times as you want;
  • Work at the Juice Store: the robot from the Juice Store needs your help to pick fruits! Deliver them as fast as you can to get a hefty reward. This task is only available a few times per day!;
  • Compete in the Crazy Run minigame: if you complete Crazy Run, our obstacle racing course, you get a coin prize! You can test your abilities as long as you still have tickets to spend;
  • Access PK XD every day: you can get coins and other items in our daily rewards for just logging into your account. As days go by, the prizes get better and better!;
  • Play PK XD: you get coins every so often for just being in the PK XD universe. The more you play, more coins you can save!;
  • Update PK XD: every time you update the app to its latest version, PKXDUpdateGirl gives you coins from us to thank you for your help!;
  • Surprise boxes: every once in a while, curious players find hidden boxes around the PK XD universe while exploring or when they complete specific actions in the game! Who knows? Maybe you'll find coins in them!

If you still think you're taking too long to collect coins after trying all these options, you can speak with an adult to buy one of our coin packs with real money. We have many options and offers waiting for you!
slide_content_4:
Gems are used to buy luxury items in PK XD, so it's a bit trickier to get them. Don't worry, though: it's worth the effort!

The easiest way to find gems in PK XD is through surprise boxes: you can find them hidden around the city while exploring or you can play minigames--you get a surprise box every time you complete 5 minigames.

If you still think you're taking too long to collect gems, you can speak with an adult and ask them to buy one of our gem packs with real money. We have several options and offers waiting for you!
slide_content_5:
One of the new aspects of the game is photography mode, which can be accessed through the cell phone menu by clicking on the camera.
In this mode, you can take pictures of landscapes or your character in the PK XD universe, changing your pose, removing the names from the interface, and adding details and stickers to make the photo even more beautiful.
Remember to post your best photos on your social networks or send them to your friends!
slide_content_6:
Stores
There are several stores on PK XD for even the most diverse of tastes. Are they:
Pet Shop: buy pet pods and accessories to care for your pets.
Beauty Salon: change your hair, makeup, and facial expressions.
Super Store: where you can find armor and special items for your character.
Premium Shop: where you can buy gems, packages, and premium items, such as special houses.

Minigames
Challenge yourself and your friends in the Arcade, where you can play Crazy Run and Pet Parade. Win special tickets in these minigames to buy gamer items in the store inside the Arcade.

In addition to these, there are still the challenges of collecting fruit at the Juice Store and delivering pizzas at Pizza Plaza.
slide_title_7: 7. What to do when the game says there are no open spots?
slide_content_7:
When a lot of people are playing on PK XD at the same time, you may receive a message that there are no spots available. This means that all of our servers are full.

But do not worry! In that case, you just need to wait a little while until someone leaves to be able to access to the game!
slide_title_8: 8. How does the PK XD Creators program work?
slide_content_8:
“PK XD Creators” is our program to support content creators that offers exclusive benefits to YouTubers, Tik Tokers, and Instagrammers who create content about PK XD.

To become a partnered content creator, you must send your application to the PK XD Creators  page, where it is also possible to review all the minimum requirements to be accepted and the program rules.

Partnered creators appear with a special icon next to their nickname on PK XD.
slide_title_9: 9. Why did I receive the same pet again?
slide_content_9:
PK XD pets are chosen at random, so you may receive a repeated pet. You can see the chances of receiving a certain type of pet inside the Pet Shop, next to the Pet Dex.

If you have reached the limit of pets you can have, you can say goodbye to one of your friends as follows:

Click on the pets menu on the cell phone,
then on the paw icon with the arrows,
and finally, select the option “pet farewell”

This decision is final and irreversible, so make sure you want to say goodbye to this pet before accepting!
slide_title_10: 10. What is the creator code, and how do I get it?
slide_content_10:
In the premium store, there is a section called "Creator Code," which provides actions and promotions for content creators participating in the PK XD Creators program. These promotions happen from time to time, and the content creators themselves disclose the active codes, which give discounts on packages or access to gifts.

To find out when a new code or promotion is active, follow our official social networks or partner creator channels.
slide_title_11: 11. How to receive PK XD updates spoilers?
slide_content_11:
Some PK XD update news is sent exclusively to content creators participating in the PK XD Creators program before it's released. If you want to keep up with these spoilers, follow the channels of our partners.

If you have a content channel that meets the requirements to participate in the program, you can sign up and become an official PK XD Creator! Find out about all the conditions and benefits on the PK XD Creators website.

Program creators have different identities within the game, such as with diverse colors and symbols, and their nickname numbers are always #000.
slide_content_12:
In the PK XD universe it is possible to adopt pets who will always be your friend, present on your adventures. To adopt your first pet, visit the Pet Shop. The robot will deliver your first pet pod, from which a random baby pet will be born after the incubation period. Don't forget to choose a creative name for your new companion!

Pet Variety
There are many different species of pets to discover! The varieties are: common, unusual, rare, ultra-rare, and legendary.

Different Pet Pods
Some pet pods may have a better chance of being born legendary pets, like the super and mega pet pods. Check the probabilities of each in the pet shop!

Taking Care of Pets' Needs
Pets need special care, such as food, water, baths, and affection. Pay attention to the signs that appear above their heads. When your pet's needs are met, it will gain experience, and eventually, it will evolve. There are three stages of evolution.
slide_title_13: 13. How do I install PK XD on my computer?
slide_content_13:
It is very simple to access the PK XD universe through your computer. Check step by step:

If your computer is Windows:

Download the program by clicking download now on our website.
Open the file that will appear in your downloads folder, and the installation will take place automatically.
Log in with your game account info or create a new one.
Tada! All ready to start your adventure!

If your computer is Mac:

Download the program by clicking download now on our website.
Open the file that will appear in your downloads folder.
Drag the file to the Applications folder and open it.
A message box will appear. Authorize your computer to open PK XD.
Log in with your game account info or create a new one.
Tada! All ready to start the adventure!

If your computer is Windows:

Tada! All ready to start your adventure!

If your computer is Mac:

Download the program by clicking download now on our website.
Open the file that will appear in your downloads folder.
Drag the file to the Applications folder and open it.
A message box will appear. Authorize your computer to open PK XD.
Log in with your game account info or create a new one.
Tada! All ready to start the adventure!
slide_content_14:
Did you meet a nice person in the game and want to add them to your list of friends? There are two easy ways to do this:

  1. Click on your friend to open the quick menu. There you will find some actions, including adding a friend. Just click the add button and wait for them to accept your request! If you already know your friend's nickname, but you are not playing on the same server, the process is different:
  2. Click on the phone in the upper left corner of your game to open the menu.
    - Click on the two-heads icon to open your friends list.
    - Click on the magnifying glass button and enter the nickname of the person you want to add in the search field.
    - Then, click Browse.
    - When your friend's profile appears, just press “Send invitation” and wait for your friend request to be accepted!
slide_content_15:
Yes! Open the game menu by clicking on the cell phone icon on the left side of the screen, and click on the gear (settings). Select the “change nickname” option to choose a new name.

Remember that some names are not available because they are considered offensive in some way.
